name: Special Topics in Studio Practice
description: An in-depth examination of selected performance disciplines, styles, and genres within their historical and critical context. Content may vary depending on instructor. Please consult the Undergraduate Drama office or check Studio Topics on our website for more details.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/UNI102Y1; DRM200Y1; Minimum CGPA of 2.7. See online application for details.
